title: Decision
description:
Architecture decision record with evaluation matrix.

INVARIANT evaluationMatrixComplete:
Every option must be evaluated against every driver.
∀ o ∈ options, d ∈ decisionDrivers: ∃ e ∈ evaluationMatrix: e.optionId = o.id ∧ e.driverId = d.id

problemDefinition.description: Description of the problem being addressed

description.description: A plain text description of the decision driver. Should not contain formatting, markdown, or special characters. Maximum 500 characters.
A brief, plain text description of the option. Should be concise and not contain formatting. Maximum 200 characters.

moreLink.description: Optional URL link to more detailed information about this option

architectureDiagramLink.description: Optional URL link to an architecture diagram for this option

architectureDiagramMermaid.description: Optional Mermaid diagram code for architecture visualization

evaluationMatrix.description: A complete evaluation matrix containing a score for each option/driver combination. Must contain exactly (options.length × decisionDrivers.length) entries, one for each option/driver pair.

optionId.description: Reference to an option.id from the options array

driverId.description: Reference to a decisionDriver.id from the decisionDrivers array

rating.description: Evaluation rating for how well this option satisfies this driver

evaluationDetails.description: List of detailed explanations for the evaluation

description.description: Brief description of the chosen solution

reasoning.description: List of reasons supporting this decision

selectedOption.description: Optional ID of the selected option from the options array

confluenceLink.description: Optional Confluence page URL where this decision is published

aiSessionId.description: Optional AI agent session ID for maintaining conversation context
